backend/main.mo: Defines types and structures for media, effects, user profiles, posts, stories, ratings, and integrates blob storage and access control into the main actor.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records linking feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles and UI/UX functionality.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application logic handling camera-first startup, identity state, routing between windows, theme control, and guest mode flow.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedEditView: Provides advanced photo/video editing with rotation, cropping, speed, transitions, overlays, and tag management for selected or uploaded media.
frontend/src/components/AIToolsView.tsx: Renders AI enhancement tools with previews, loading states, and simulated processing for selected media.
frontend/src/components/AREffectSelector: Displays animated AR overlay effects with position, scale, and rotation changes simulating face tracking.
frontend/src/components/CameraView.tsx: Implements photo capture and authenticated video recording using the device camera, supporting media saving and capture modes.
frontend/src/components/EnhanceView.tsx: Applies adjustable filters and thousands of presets to photos, supporting uploads, captured images, and saving enhanced results.
frontend/src/components/EntertainmentVie: Displays a community entertainment feed with trending posts and allows authenticated users to create new posts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GalleryView.tsx: Shows all saved media with tag search, deletion, sharing, and entry points to enhancement or editing tools.
frontend/src/components/GlobalSidebar.ts: Sidebar component rendering navigation buttons and user profile, filtering items for guest users and highlighting the active window.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header bar with app branding and login/logout handling using Internet Identity and React Query.
frontend/src/components/IntroSplash.tsx: Animated splash screen that displays branding and transitions out after a timed sequence before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/LoginView.tsx: Login view offering Internet Identity authentication or guest mode with styled card UI.
frontend/src/components/LuckyView.tsx: Chat-style AI assistant interface with predefined quick actions and rule-based response generation.
frontend/src/components/Nearby20View.tsx: Nearby feed showing media posts from users, with tag search, trending filter, and guest-mode restrictions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with username and bio, submitting via a saveProfile mutation and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: Displays the logged-in user's profile and media with tabs and stats, handling loading and missing-profile states.
frontend/src/components/SettingsView.tsx: Settings screen allowing theme selection, preferences updates, and logout, with local state and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/StoriesView.tsx: Manages viewing and creating stories, including dialogs, identity checks, and story persistence via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/WindowNavigation: Defines sidebar and mobile navigation for switching between major app windows using a window list and active state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes state via a hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating media, comments, likes, and user profile data through an actor interface. Includes cache invalidation and parameterized queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and defines multiple OKLCH-based theme variables for dark, light, and custom theme variants. Establishes global radius and color system for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering. Initializes a shared QueryClient instance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based query params. Supports fallback logic between URL and session state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme extensions, mapping CSS variables to OKLCH colors, shadows, radii, animations, and component palettes. Enables dark mode by class and scans project files for usage.
project_state.json: Defines project version and outlines a full PHONIX app redesign, documenting architectural notes, known issues, and multiple feature requirements. Focus areas include UI/UX overhaul, removal of placeholders, improved navigation, backend-backed social features, and a stable media pipeline.
